prompts.prompt: Can you help me extract just the text content from this Word document so I can see what's written without all the formatting?
I need to create a new Word document with a title, some paragraphs, and a bulleted list for my project proposal.
There's a Word document with comments in it - can you show me what comments people have added throughout the document?
I have a contract that needs several changes made to it, but I want to track all my edits so the other party can see what I modified.
Can you convert this Word document to images so I can see how each page looks visually?
I need to update multiple dates and company names throughout this legal document, but preserve all the original formatting and show what changed.
There's a Word document with tracked changes already in it - can you show me what the current version looks like with all changes accepted?
I need to create a professional report with headers, footers, formatted tables, and embedded images, then save it as a Word document.
Can you help me review this contract by making tracked changes to fix legal terminology, update clauses, and add comments explaining the rationale for each change?
I have a Word document that needs major restructuring - moving sections around, updating cross-references, changing formatting, and ensuring all changes are tracked for legal review.
